rpg.item

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.item.ItemImplementation
      • rpg.item.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, Parent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackPack, Purse

    public abstract class Container
extends ItemImplementation
implements Parent
    An abstract class of containers. A container is an item that consists of other items
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic
    See Also:
    invariant for private variable

        item - The item to check
        Returns:
